verses.verse: וַיֵּרָ֤א <WH7200> vai-ye-Ra appeared אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> 'e-Lav about יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, And the LORD בְּאֵלֹנֵ֖י <WH436> be-'e-lo-Nei unto him in the plains מַמְרֵ֑א <WH4471> mam-Re; of Mamre וְה֛וּא <WH1931> ve-Hu he יֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> yo-Shev and he sat פֶּֽתַח־ <WH6607> pe-tach- door הָאֹ֖הֶל <WH168> ha-'O-hel in the tent כְּחֹ֥ם <WH2527> ke-Chom in the heat הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> hai-Yom. of the day

וַיִּשָּׂ֤א <WH5375> vai-yis-Sa And he lift up עֵינָיו֙ <WH5869> 'ei-Nav his eyes וַיַּ֔רְא <WH7200> vai-Yar, and looked וְהִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh behold שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> she-lo-Shah and lo three אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> 'a-na-Shim, men נִצָּבִ֖ים <WH5324> nitz-tza-Vim stood עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav; opposite וַיַּ֗רְא <WH7200> vai-Yar, by him and when he saw וַיָּ֤רָץ <WH7323> vai-Ya-rotz [them] he ran לִקְרָאתָם֙ <WH7125> lik-ra-Tam to meet מִפֶּ֣תַח <WH6607> mip-Pe-tach door הָאֹ֔הֶל <WH168> ha-'O-hel, them from the tent וַיִּשְׁתַּ֖חוּ <WH7812> vai-yish-Ta-chu and bowed אָֽרְצָה׃ <WH776> 'A-re-tzah. himself toward the ground

וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> vai-yo-Mar; And said אֲדֹנָ֗י <WH113> 'a-do-Nai, my lord אִם־ <WH518> 'im- if נָ֨א <WH4994> na now מָצָ֤אתִי <WH4672> ma-Tza-ti if now I have found חֵן֙ <WH2580> chen favour בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <WH5869> be-'ei-Nei-cha, in thy sight אַל־ <WH408> 'al- nay נָ֥א <WH4994> na please תַעֲבֹ֖ר <WH5674> ta-'a-Vor pass not away מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> me-'Al and עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5650> 'av-De-cha. I pray thee from thy servant

יֻקַּֽח־ <WH3947> yuk-kach- be fetched נָ֣א <WH4994> na I pray you מְעַט־ <WH4592> me-'at- Let a little מַ֔יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim, water וְרַחֲצ֖וּ <WH7364> ve-ra-cha-Tzu and wash רַגְלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH7272> rag-lei-Chem; your feet וְהִֽשָּׁעֲנ֖וּ <WH8172> ve-hish-sha-'a-Nu and rest yourselves תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat under הָעֵֽץ׃ <WH6086> ha-'Etz. under the tree

וְאֶקְחָ֨ה <WH3947> ve-'ek-Chah And I will fetch פַת־ <WH6595> fat- a morsel לֶ֜חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem of bread וְסַעֲד֤וּ <WH5582> ve-sa-'a-Du and comfort ye לִבְּכֶם֙ <WH3820> lib-be-Chem your hearts אַחַ֣ר <WH310> 'a-Char after that תַּעֲבֹ֔רוּ <WH5674> ta-'a-Vo-ru, ye shall pass on כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- to כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> ken So עֲבַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH5674> 'a-var-Tem for therefore are ye come עַֽל־ <WH5921> 'al- and עַבְדְּכֶ֑ם <WH5650> 'av-de-Chem; your servant וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> vai-Yo-me-Ru, as thou hast said כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> ken So תַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> ta-'a-Seh So do כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher you דִּבַּֽרְתָּ׃ <WH1696> dib-Bar-ta. And they said

וַיְמַהֵ֧ר <WH4116> vay-ma-Her hastened אַבְרָהָ֛ם <WH85> 'av-ra-Ham And Abraham הָאֹ֖הֱלָה <WH168> ha-'O-he-lah into the tent אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to שָׂרָ֑ה <WH8283> sa-Rah; unto Sarah וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer, and said מַהֲרִ֞י <WH4116> ma-ha-Ri Make ready quickly שְׁלֹ֤שׁ <WH7969> she-Losh three סְאִים֙ <WH5429> se-'Im measures קֶ֣מַח <WH7058> Ke-mach meal סֹ֔לֶת <WH5560> So-let, of fine ל֖וּשִׁי <WH3888> Lu-shi knead וַעֲשִׂ֥י <WH6213> va-'a-Si upon the hearth עֻגֽוֹת׃ <WH5692> u-Got. cakes

וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- to הַבָּקָ֖ר <WH1241> hab-ba-Kar unto the herd רָ֣ץ <WH7323> ratz ran אַבְרָהָ֑ם <WH85> 'av-ra-Ham; And Abraham וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach and fetcht בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- afflicted בָּקָ֜ר <WH1241> ba-Kar to the herd רַ֤ךְ <WH7390> rach tender וָטוֹב֙ <WH2896> va-tOv and good וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> vai-yit-Ten and gave אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַנַּ֔עַר <WH5288> han-Na-'ar, [it] unto a young man וַיְמַהֵ֖ר <WH4116> vay-ma-Her and he hasted לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot to dress אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853> o-To.

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach And he took חֶמְאָ֜ה <WH2529> chem-'Ah butter וְחָלָ֗ב <WH2461> ve-cha-Lav, and milk וּבֶן־ <WH1121> u-ven- afflicted הַבָּקָר֙ <WH1241> hab-ba-Kar bull אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah, which he had dressed וַיִּתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> vai-yit-Ten and set לִפְנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6440> lif-nei-Hem; [it] before them וְהֽוּא־ <WH1931> ve-hu- and he עֹמֵ֧ד <WH5975> 'o-Med and he stood עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem and תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat under הָעֵ֖ץ <WH6086> ha-'Etz by them under the tree וַיֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> vai-yo-Che-lu. and they did eat

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru And they said אֵׅלָׅ֔יׅוׅ <WH413> 'e-Lav, unto אַיֵּ֖ה <WH346> 'ai-Yeh unto him Where שָׂרָ֣ה <WH8283> sa-Rah [is] Sarah אִשְׁתֶּ֑ךָ <WH802> 'ish-Te-cha; ess וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> hin-Neh There בָאֹֽהֶל׃ <WH168> va-'O-hel. Behold in the tent

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer, And he said שׁ֣וֹב <WH7725> Shov I will certainly אָשׁ֤וּב <WH7725> 'a-Shuv return אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha to you כָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> ka-'Et unto thee according to the time חַיָּ֔ה <WH2416> chai-Yah, of life וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> ve-hin-neh- and behold בֵ֖ן <WH1121> ven shall have a son לְשָׂרָ֣ה <WH8283> le-sa-Rah and lo Sarah אִשְׁתֶּ֑ךָ <WH802> 'ish-Te-cha; thy wife וְשָׂרָ֥ה <WH8283> ve-sa-Rah And Sarah שֹׁמַ֛עַת <WH8085> sho-Ma-'at heard פֶּ֥תַח <WH6607> Pe-tach door הָאֹ֖הֶל <WH168> ha-'O-hel [it] in the tent וְה֥וּא <WH1931> ve-Hu which אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <WH310> 'a-cha-Rav. which [was] behind him

וְאַבְרָהָ֤ם <WH85> ve-'av-ra-Ham Now Abraham וְשָׂרָה֙ <WH8283> ve-sa-Rah and Sarah זְקֵנִ֔ים <WH2205> ze-ke-Nim, [were] old בָּאִ֖ים <WH935> ba-'Im [and] well stricken בַּיָּמִ֑ים <WH3117> bai-ya-Mim; in age חָדַל֙ <WH2308> cha-Dal [and] it ceased לִהְי֣וֹת <WH1961> lih-Yot become לְשָׂרָ֔ה <WH8283> le-sa-Rah, to be with Sarah אֹ֖רַח <WH734> 'O-rach after the manner כַּנָּשִֽׁים׃ <WH802> kan-na-Shim. of women

וַתִּצְחַ֥ק <WH6711> vat-titz-Chak laughed שָׂרָ֖ה <WH8283> sa-Rah Therefore Sarah בְּקִרְבָּ֣הּ <WH7130> be-kir-Bah within herself לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying אַחֲרֵ֤י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei After בְלֹתִי֙ <WH1086> ve-lo-Ti I am waxed old הָֽיְתָה־ <WH1961> ha-ye-tah- have לִּ֣י li עֶדְנָ֔ה <WH5730> 'ed-Nah, shall I have pleasure וַֽאדֹנִ֖י <WH113> va-do-Ni my lord זָקֵֽן׃ <WH2204> za-Ken. being old also

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אַבְרָהָ֑ם <WH85> 'av-ra-Ham; unto Abraham לָ֣מָּה <WH4100> Lam-mah Wherefore זֶּה֩ <WH2088> zeh he צָחֲקָ֨ה <WH6711> tza-cha-Kah laugh שָׂרָ֜ה <WH8283> sa-Rah did Sarah לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> le-Mor, saying הַאַ֥ף <WH637> ha-'Af yet אֻמְנָ֛ם <WH552> 'um-Nam Shall I of a surety אֵלֵ֖ד <WH3205> 'e-Led bear וַאֲנִ֥י <WH589> va-'a-Ni a child which זָקַֽנְתִּי׃ <WH2204> za-Kan-ti. am old

הֲיִפָּלֵ֥א <WH6381> ha-yip-pa-Le too hard מֵיְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh Jehovah דָּבָ֑ר <WH1697> da-Var; any thing לַמּוֹעֵ֞ד <WH4150> lam-mo-'Ed time אָשׁ֥וּב <WH7725> 'a-Shuv I will return אֵלֶ֛יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha about כָּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> ka-'Et unto thee according to the time חַיָּ֖ה <WH2416> chai-Yah of life וּלְשָׂרָ֥ה <WH8283> u-le-sa-Rah and Sarah בֵֽן׃ <WH1121> Ven. shall have a son

וַתְּכַחֵ֨שׁ <WH3584> vat-te-cha-Chesh denied שָׂרָ֧ה׀ <WH8283> sa-Rah Then Sarah לֵאמֹ֛ר <WH559> le-Mor saying לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo Nay צָחַ֖קְתִּי <WH6711> tza-Chak-ti I laughed כִּ֣י׀ <WH3588> ki for יָרֵ֑אָה <WH3372> ya-Re-'ah; not for she was afraid וַיֹּ֥אמֶר׀ <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said לֹ֖א <WH3808> lo No כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki did צָחָֽקְתְּ׃ <WH6711> tza-Cha-ket. but thou didst laugh

וַיָּקֻ֤מוּ <WH6965> vai-ya-Ku-mu rose up מִשָּׁם֙ <WH8033> mish-Sham there הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH582> ha-'a-na-Shim, And the men וַיַּשְׁקִ֖פוּ <WH8259> vai-yash-Ki-fu from thence and looked עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> pe-Nei toward סְדֹ֑ם <WH5467> se-Dom; Sodom וְאַ֨בְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> ve-'Av-ra-Ham, and Abraham הֹלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> ho-Lech went עִמָּ֖ם <WH5973> 'im-Mam them לְשַׁלְּחָֽם׃ <WH7971> le-shal-le-Cham. with them to bring them on the way

וַֽיהֹוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אָמָ֑ר <WH559> 'a-Mar; said הַֽמְכַסֶּ֤ה <WH3680> ham-chas-Seh Shall I hide אֲנִי֙ <WH589> 'a-Ni I מֵֽאַבְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> me-'av-ra-Ham, from Abraham אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher that thing which אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am עֹשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> 'o-Seh. I do

וְאַ֨בְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> ve-'Av-ra-Ham, Seeing that Abraham הָי֧וֹ <WH1961> ha-Yo will surely יִֽהְיֶ֛ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh become לְג֥וֹי <WH1471> le-Goy nation גָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol shall surely become a great וְעָצ֑וּם <WH6099> ve-'a-Tzum; and mighty וְנִ֨בְרְכוּ <WH1288> ve-Niv-re-chu shall be blessed ב֔וֹ vo, כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> kol all גּוֹיֵ֥י <WH1471> go-Yei and all the nations הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. of the earth

כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for יְדַעְתִּ֗יו <WH3045> ye-da'-Tiv, For I know לְמַעַן֩ <WH4616> le-ma-'An so אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher him that יְצַוֶּ֜ה <WH6680> ye-tzav-Veh he will command אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בָּנָ֤יו <WH1121> ba-Nav his children וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בֵּיתוֹ֙ <WH1004> bei-To and his household אַחֲרָ֔יו <WH310> 'a-cha-Rav, after him וְשָֽׁמְרוּ֙ <WH8104> ve-sha-me-Ru and they shall keep דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> De-rech the way יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot to do צְדָקָ֖ה <WH6666> tze-da-Kah justice וּמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> u-mish-Pat; and judgment לְמַ֗עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an, so הָבִ֤יא <WH935> ha-Vi may bring יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh that the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- about אַבְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> 'av-ra-Ham, upon Abraham אֵ֥ת <WH853> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- what דִּבֶּ֖ר <WH1696> dib-Ber that which he hath spoken עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> 'a-Lav. about

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, And the LORD זַעֲקַ֛ת <WH2201> za-'a-Kat Because the cry סְדֹ֥ם <WH5467> se-Dom of Sodom וַעֲמֹרָ֖ה <WH6017> va-'a-mo-Rah and Gomorrah כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- is indeed רָ֑בָּה <WH7227> Rab-bah; is great וְחַ֨טָּאתָ֔ם <WH2403> ve-Chat-ta-Tam, and because their sin כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki is indeed כָבְדָ֖ה <WH3513> cha-ve-Dah grievous מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> me-'Od. is very

אֵֽרֲדָה־ <WH3381> 'e-ra-dah- I will go down נָּ֣א <WH4994> na now וְאֶרְאֶ֔ה <WH7200> ve-'er-'Eh, now and see הַכְּצַעֲקָתָ֛הּ <WH6818> hak-ke-tza-'a-ka-Tah according to the cry הַבָּ֥אָה <WH935> hab-Ba-'ah of it which is come אֵלַ֖י <WH413> 'e-Lai about עָשׂ֣וּ׀ <WH6213> 'a-Su whether they have done כָּלָ֑ה <WH3617> ka-Lah; altogether וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- and if לֹ֖א <WH3808> lo not אֵדָֽעָה׃ <WH3045> 'e-Da-'ah. unto me and if not I will know

וַיִּפְנ֤וּ <WH6437> vai-yif-Nu turned their faces מִשָּׁם֙ <WH8033> mish-Sham there הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> ha-'a-na-Shim, the men וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> vai-ye-le-Chu and went סְדֹ֑מָה <WH5467> se-Do-mah; toward Sodom וְאַ֨בְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> ve-'Av-ra-Ham, but Abraham עוֹדֶ֥נּוּ <WH5750> o-Den-nu yet עֹמֵ֖ד <WH5975> 'o-Med stood לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> lif-Nei before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD

וַיִּגַּ֥שׁ <WH5066> vai-yig-Gash drew near אַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> 'av-ra-Ham And Abraham וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> vai-yo-Mar; and said הַאַ֣ף <WH637> ha-'Af indeed תִּסְפֶּ֔ה <WH5595> tis-Peh, Wilt thou also destroy צַדִּ֖יק <WH6662> tzad-Dik the righteous עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with רָשָֽׁע׃ <WH7563> ra-Sha'. wicked
